author: dkulp
msg: Add support to the embedded broker an such to pass extra params to the broker url to work around AMQ-3879 to try and make the tests more reliable.

author: dkulp
msg: When using an async transport, make sure an exception is thrown on a timeout, not a null return;

author: astitcher
msg: SSL changes for new buffer management
- Needed to rework SslConnector to mirror
TCPConnector in order to make changes to
the client side, but now Unix SSL and TCP
client implementations are much more alike.

author: astitcher
msg: Rearrange buffer memory ownership to avoid leaking buffer memory
